attributes.title: Truly disappointing
attributes.review: I was curious to see how the US president is doing, and the first thing I see when I open the app is a clown? I wanted to see the president, not a act in a circus. Made this glitch is fixed with the upcoming election.

attributes.title: NO NO NO NO
attributes.review: THIS APP IS A NO! I dowloaded it so I can get the latest updates and it just immediately exited me out even after a hundred tries! I kept redownloading but just NO! This app SUCKSSSSSS and I wish I can rate it -5 stars but that’s still being too nice smh.

attributes.title: The Worst App Ever🤢
attributes.review: Don’t download this app! Upon opening it, it converts people into ignorants like the creator. I was almost turned but thanks to my common sense, I resisted the evil. I am still shaking and I fear that I might be traumatized for the rest of my life. Again DO NOT SUPPORT THIS APP!!🙏🙏

attributes.title: This app cost me my life!!!
attributes.review: Do not get this app this is terrible! It ruined my life! For example, the more pro-Trump things I would hear, I would lose 100 brain cells, eventually it became too much so sadly I had to depart with this app. WARNING: SIDE AFFECTS INCLUDE MAJOR IGNORANCE AND A GENERAL FEELING OF STUPIDITY WHEN TALKING TO FRIENDS AND FAMILY.

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE I WAS HARRASED
attributes.review: me as a 63 year old lady was harassed by trump himself, said he wanted to have a 3 sum with me, him and his daughter!! later i went to mcdonald’s got a happy meal and my toy was gone, i seen trump in my bed holding my dino. he then slapped me with a pork chop and pushed me out the window. I AM NOT HAPPY 💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔💔

attributes.title: Ew
attributes.review: This app was terrible. It was hard to navigate, and I feel like it was filled with fake news and drama. Definitely don’t recommend. As a representative for Gen Z I give this a one star review. (I wish it could be lower)

attributes.title: Free movie
attributes.userName: A S T R A L
attributes.review:
Shrek Script

 {Man} Once upon a time there was a lovely princess.

But she had an enchantment upon her of a fearful sort which could only

She was locked away in a castle guarded by a terrible fire-breathing 

dragon.

Many brave knigts had attempted to free her from this dreadful prison, 

but non prevailed.

She waited in the dragon's keep in the highest room of the tallest 

tower for her true love and true love's first kiss.

{Laughing} 

Like that's ever gonna happen.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: This app is horrible. It is a scam on which it makes you believe that Trump is a good president and if you say no it will find your home and kill you and your family. UNBELIEVABLE. It steals your food and pet snake. Take it down now

attributes.title: Worst App Ever! Causes Brain Death!
attributes.review: This app is promoting the lowest grade of energy since the Big Bang happened...it is so dark it is causing an infectious disease to leak from devices that it is downloaded on and can even lead to brain death. Please delete and destroy ASAP.

attributes.title: Waste of storage space!
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app I started uncontrollably gagging. I just couldn’t stand having such trash on my phone, staining my good Christian data plan. Overall horrible experience.
